issue.title: [Feature]: Measurement uncertainty
issue.body:
### Feature Request

Should use Measurements.jl on the Julia side, and allow [`uncertainties`](https://pythonhosted.org/uncertainties/) array as input.

Loss function maybe could be Gaussian-Gaussian likelihood? Or KL divergence?

nodes.body: This is trickier than I thought, for the reason that the tree constants should be a different type than the dataâ€¦
